WorkItem.Summary: Microsoft JScript runtime error: '$' is undefined

Comments.Message: This is because the version of jQuery was updated since the tutorial was last published. Make sure that the script reference in /Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml matches the version of jQuery in your /Scripts folder, probably /Scripts/jquery-1.5.1.min.js.

Exactly the problem I had (and I just installed some java crap with e-trade so I first assumed it was that).

The exact solution to fix the problem jongalloway, thanks!

Perfect solution! 
In my case it was not version 1.5.1., but the newer 1.6.2 that was available, where the _Latuout referred to the older 1.5.1 version.
Thanks a lot, this saves me a couple of hours deep-thinking ;-)

This worked. I'd suggest that Author take the time to update the original article. This is a popular full-featured example of MVC. Judging by the comments, lots of people are left twisting in the wind.
Thank you very much. Saved my time.
